description: This file defines a React context and provider component for authentication management, including handling login, registration, logout, and user state persistence.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component managing authentication state, providing login, registration, and logout functionalities, and persisting user session using localStorage.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Asynchronous function to authenticate user with provided username and password, updates state on success or error.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Asynchronous function to register a new user with provided username and password, updates state on success or error.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Function to clear authentication token and user state, effectively logging out the user.
